abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed project is designed to
            assist the Government in strengthening its management of the
            petroleum sector. The project would contain the following
            components: (i) assistance to the Ministry of Mines and
            Energy; (ii) assistance to HYDROCONGO, the national oil
            company; (iii) special studies including: (a) geophysical
            studies in the remote Cuvette region and (b) a study of the
            feasibility of enhanced oil recovery in Emeraude, an
            existing offshore field; and (iv) other studies in the oil
            sector. The proposed project would assist the Government in
            its efforts to strengthen the institutions in the Petroleum sector.
